RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Border Patrol agents: Jorge Luis Trevino and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who had probable cause to arrest Ignacio Rodriguez upon contact with him
Defendant whose arrest was deemed justified due to sufficient nexus between the two vehicles and awareness of familial relationships
Driver of the white sedan who had been arrested for transporting illegal aliens and had a familial relationship with the registered owner of the black truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ: Border Patrol agents involved in the investigation of suspicious vehicles on FM 2050, with sufficient evidence to conclude that the two vehicles were driving in tandem
